title: William Paterson (goalkeeper)
text: William Paterson (born 16 September 1902) was a Scottish <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="Dunfermline%20Athletic%20F.C.">Dunfermline Athletic</a>, <a href="Boston%20Wonder%20Workers">Boston Wonder Workers</a>, <a href="Dundee%20United%20F.C.">Dundee United</a>, <a href="Arsenal%20F.C.">Arsenal</a> and <a href="Airdrieonians%20F.C.%20%281878%29">Airdrieonians</a>.
